movies.title: Der Fall Jägerstätter
movies.plot: Alternating between early-1970's interviews with his wife, priest, and other villagers and re-enactments of his final months...  »
movies.simplePlot: Alternating between early-1970's interviews with his wife, priest, and other villagers and re-enactments of his final months...

biography.bio: Kurt Weinzierl was born on April 15, 1931 in Innsbruck, Austria. He was an actor and director, known for Tohuwabohu (1990), Der Fall Jägerstätter (1971) and Kein Pardon (1993). He was married to Veronika Faber and Susanne Weinzierl. He died on October 10, 2008 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Kurt Weinzierl

biography.bio: Julia Gschnitzer was born on December 21, 1931 in Innsbruck, Austria. She is an actress, known for Le mur invisible (2012), Les héritiers (1998) and Hierankl (2003).
biography.name: Julia Gschnitzer

biography.bio: Rose Dybal is an actress, known for Der Fall Jägerstätter (1971).
biography.name: Rose Dybal

biography.bio: Helmut Wlasak was born on March 26, 1930 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor, known for Volpone (1970), Der Fall Jägerstätter (1971) and Verurteilt 1910 (1974). He died on November 22, 2012 in Ampass, Tyrol, Austria.
biography.name: Helmut Wlasak

biography.placeOfBirth: Breslau, Silesia, Germany [now Wroclaw, Dolnoslaskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Walter Jokisch was born on December 9, 1914 in Breslau, Silesia, Germany. He was an actor, known for Ich fahre Patschold (1964), Campingplatz (1964) and Der Hausfreund (1969). He was married to Grete Weil Jockisch and Lilo Weinsheimer. He died on February 23, 1984 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Walter Jokisch

biography.bio: Tom Krinzinger is an actor, known for Der Fluggast (1964), Welcome in Vienna - Partie 3: Welcome in Vienna (1986) and Seven Minutes (1989).
biography.name: Tom Krinzinger

biography.bio: Ernst Auer is an actor, known for Das Wandern ist Herrn Müllers Lust (1973), Der Fall Jägerstätter (1971) and Veronika, die Magd (1951).
biography.name: Ernst Auer

biography.bio: Ernst Essel is an actor, known for The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick (1972), Der Schandfleck (1967) and Die falsche Annonce (1973).
biography.name: Ernst Essel

biography.bio: Guido Wieland was born on November 18, 1906 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Das Abenteuer eines armen Christenmenschen (1971), Onkel Guido (1966) and Essig und Öl (1978). He died on March 10, 1993 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Guido Wieland

biography.bio: Bruno Dallansky was born on September 19, 1928 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor, known for Der stille Ozean (1983), Jakob der Letzte (1976) and Fremde, liebe Fremde (1991). He was married to Judith Holzmeister. He died on August 5, 2008 in Vienna.
biography.name: Bruno Dallansky

biography.bio: Michael Toost was born on December 15, 1927 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor, known for The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick (1972), Passion eines Politikers (1970) and Der Rowdy auf der Treppe (1970). He died on June 18, 1983 in Vienna.
biography.name: Michael Toost

biography.bio: Gerhard Geisler was born on October 21, 1907 in Cottbus, Germany. He was an actor, known for Grenzzwischenfall (1960), Die Gegenprobe (1965) and So war Mama (1962). He died on September 22, 1977 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Gerhard Geisler

biography.bio: Fritz Schmiedel was born on March 26, 1906 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Das vierte Gebot (1964), Le Silence de la Mer (1949) and Der Mieter (1967). He died on November 10, 1979 in Innsbruck, Austria.
biography.name: Fritz Schmiedel

biography.bio: Hermann Kutscher was born on January 31, 1923 in Steyr, Upper Austria, Austria. He was a director and actor, known for Die Flucht (1966), Schwester Bonaventura (1969) and Freunde und Feinde (1967). He died on May 29, 1997.
biography.name: Hermann Kutscher

biography.bio: Wolfgang Kieling was born on March 16, 1924 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor and assistant director, known for Torn Curtain (1966), Der Anwalt (1976) and Hamburg: City of Vice (1964). He was married to Monika Gabriel, Gisela Uhlen, Jola Jobst and Göllnitz, Johanna. He died on October 7, 1985 in Hamburg, West Germany.
biography.name: Wolfgang Kieling
